name: Can You Get Out 2
description:
This is same as CYGO game where you have to escape the maze which is guarded by monsters... However in this one there is an easy way to get out of the maze if you can figure it out :).. You will get different score depending on how you found the exit.  Also if you experience freezes press alt+f4 to force quit the game...

This game took a lot of effort to make and I really appreciate any support I get, After playing the game please leave your  reviews down here

Thank you :)

Check out my other game https://ritvikshukla.itch.io/evacuate-survival-horror-shooter this game is a parody game where you play as John Weak 😶
